tool_description: Performs AC load flow analysis to determine voltage magnitudes, phase angles, and power flows throughout the electrical network.

bus_data.description: Bus configuration data in CSV format: bus_id,type,voltage,angle,load_p,load_q

convergence_tolerance.description: Convergence tolerance for iterative solution (1e-6 to 1e-3)

error_messages: Invalid bus data format: Each bus entry must contain 6 comma-separated values.
Invalid branch data format: Each branch entry must contain 5 comma-separated values.
Network connectivity error: The electrical network is not properly connected.
Convergence failure: Solution did not converge within specified iterations.
Parameter out of range: convergence_tolerance must be between 1e-6 and 1e-3, max_iterations between 10 and 1000.
usage: Provide bus_data and branch_data arrays with network parameters. Optionally include generator_data and adjust convergence settings. Returns voltage profiles and power flow results.

bus_voltages.description: Voltage magnitudes at each bus in per unit

bus_angles.description: Voltage phase angles at each bus in degrees

branch_flows.description: Active power flows in branches in MW
